entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story who is deciding what to do with Pettigrew.

entities.name: pettigrew
entities.description: A person who has done something wrong and is being considered for punishment.

entities.name: azkaban
entities.description: A prison where Pettigrew can be sent.

entities.name: black
entities.description: A person who is trying to persuade Harry to spare Pettigrew.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: A person who is also trying to persuade Harry to spare Pettigrew.

relationships.description: Harry is considering what to do with Pettigrew, whether to send him to Azkaban or spare his life.
Black is trying to persuade Harry to spare Pettigrew's life.
Lupin is also trying to persuade Harry to spare Pettigrew's life.
Pettigrew can be sent to Azkaban as punishment.
